Instability¶

Instability of neutrino oscillation means the rapid growth of the oscillations.

Bimodal Instability¶

MAA¶

Multi-azimuth angle (MAA) instability, first discovered by Georg Raffelt et al, in the work Axial Symmetry Breaking in Self-Induced Flavor Conversion of Supernova Neutrino Fluxes , is an intrinsic symmetry breaking.

This instability may come from the term that is related to the velocity of neutrinos in the Hamiltonian.

Refs & Notes¶

.
